Text:
As you may know by now, ABC made a terrible decision and chose not to renew our favourite sci-fi-drama series, FlashForward for a second season.

If you want to bring it back ------> http://saveflashforward.tumblr.com/

Please visit the above mentioned site and help to save Flash Forward!

Disappointed if this series doesn't continue, although a lot of the plot lines were booooooring and some of the characters were really poor.

Still, there were enough interesting bits to make it worthwhile.
